page.title: 07Transport to Papa Stour.
page.content: You can sail from Aberdeen to Lerwick on the "{St.Clair}"(12 to 14 hours) or you can travel by air to the shetland mainland.Aberdeen to Sumburgh takes 45 minutes or you can fly from Edinburgh to Tingwall in 2 hours. Once in Shetland ,visitors to {Papa} have to make their way to {West Burra {firth}.As the bus runs only once a week,a taxi has to be hired and the journey takes about 1 hour. The "{Ivy Leaf}" sails to {Papa}on Mondays,Wednesdays and Fridays with the mail and the crossing takes 45 minutes(fare-10p). The island itself has only 1 mile of road,from the pier to the school (almost!).This is used by 6 tractors, 2 motor-bikes,1 Landrover and 4 bicycles.
